item.title: Dynamic Stylesheets - WordPress Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 10.3.Â WordPress Dynamic Stylesheets In the previous chapter, we understood the structure of a WordPress theme and use it to construct a basic child theme. We also saw the use of the template files in a child theme. In this section - WordPress Dynamic Stylesheets, we explore the child theme further and use it to enable dynamic stylesheets in the WordPress. Earlier we used HTML Import 2 Plugin to import static HTML pages to WordPress.
